name: Kashef Sensor Suite
desc: A widely-available piece of Mayorate military hardware, the Kashef Sensor Suite increases combat sensor range by %s percent and effective weapon range by %s percent. Campaign sensor strength is increased by %s.

name: AI Crew
desc: %s percent of the crew is replaced by the installation of an AI core. Crew loss is decreased accordingly, and the management of engine and weapon systems is improved by %s percent. Ship repair rates take a penalty of %s, as fewer crew will be available to deal with the ship's physical infrastructure.
